Your experience is just round the corner
NCS: Medical Feedback Form
Dear {!IF(Contact.Parent_Name__c <> ""," "& ( Contact.Parent_Name__c ) &" ","Parent or Guardian")},
As discussed, please find attached the feedback form to give to {!Contact.FirstName}’s doctor or specialist to complete.
The first part of the attached document is a letter to you. Please make sure to read and keep this as it has instructions about completing and returning the form. It also has details about how {!Contact.FirstName}’s medical and support information will be used on NCS.
If you have any questions, feel free to get in touch.
The NCS Team - The Challenge
You can contact our Inclusion team by: Phone: 0333 150 2425 Email: inclusion.support@the-challenge.org Our opening hours are 9am - 7pm Monday to Friday and 10am - 6pm on Saturdays and Sundays.
